Review.Titre: A truly awful experience
Review.Contenu: I bought a refurbished sat nav from Garmin FactoryOutletStore. It suffered a complet system failure on a trip through the alps. I tried to return it but it cost €40 and was never delivered, arriving back a while later. In the meantime, I purchased another from the smae company, this time having to pay €45 to have it sent. I was told this was because it was not being delivered within the UK. When I returned to the UK I returned, as arranged, the first, faulty sat nav, having to pay £9.45 to do so. I received absolutely no refunds on the €85 and £8.45 in postage I had to pay. The whole process has taken nearly a year in all. This is not a company I would recommend. At one poiint, my emails were not responded to. Now when I call I get what seems to be a US call centre, not the UK customer services I first spoke to when ordering the first sat nav. Given the time frame, it's difficult to give a date for my experience. It's ongoing regarding the refunds.

Review.Titre: A complete scam
Review.Contenu: A complete scam. Do not spend your hard earned money to fund this disgrace of an retailer. I've been waiting two months for a refund. With each inquiry (ie,, 4 contacts) I'm told, "It will be complete in two business days". My next stop is the Attorney General.Bottom line... Steer clear.

Review.Titre: I ordered Sonicare replacements on July 31, 2023
Review.Contenu: I ordered Sonicare replacement heads on July 31, 2023.  I waited over a month and called.  They said they were not in stock but would be in about 2 weeks and would ship then.  I did this 2 more times and as of today (Dec 1, 2023 - 4th call) they are still not in stock.  My original item was $31.96 and now it's listed as in stock for $93.99.  Clearly they do not want to honor the original price they sold it to me for.   I found a suitable replacement on their website and said send me these instead.  Reply was: Oh, they're not in stock either even though the website says they are In Stock.  Then she says the website has not been updated.  If that is the case, they're selling inventory they don't have in stock.  If I could give this company a NEGATIVE 10, I WOULD.  What a bunch of CON artists!!!!  Don't order from these "people".  To factory outlet: don't bother with a pathetic response, I'll never read it... juist get me my refund!

Review.Titre: misrepresentation of Garmin GPS
Review.Contenu: Company lists a reconditioned Garmin Drive 50LMT, which means Lifetime Maps and Traffic. They show a Traffic receiver power cord in their picture. But when I asked if it is included in the sale, I was told that only a standard cable is included and I would have to purchase a Traffic power cord in order to have traffic. For $60, almost as much as the GPS. CSR seemed unable to accept that this was misrepresentation. Of course that's not his job. And oddly enough, when you look at some of the reviews on Trustpilot, the written reviews are pretty bad, but they have 5 stars on them. Seems pretty bad to me. I guess Trustpilot is not to be trusted either.

Review.Titre: The Factory Outlet store ( also trading…
Review.Contenu: The Factory Outlet store ( also trading as JZ Y and PE Group Azamoor) seem to be a  fraudulent scheme that involves creating fake online stores from China. These fake stores lure unsuspecting customers with attractive discounts and offers, but they either deliver counterfeit or inferior products, or nothing at all. The customers who fall victim to this scam end up losing their money and personal information, and have no recourse to get a refund or compensation. I git a delivery notification pretending they had sent the goods but its all lies.I did get emails back after lots of digging and was told lies about shipment issues and they have offered part payment back but not shipping. We will see.

Service is shocking.————-Update. 4 days to respond. Tell me to deal direct with Garmin. They send me a link that is totally useless. I then email them again and that was 2 days ago again. Nothing. Please Please Please Garmin stop dealing with this company and secondly Please do not buy off this company. Absolute fraud and joke. I’m off to the ombudsman and my credit card company. Double shocking

Review.Titre: Problems with delivery and receiving product …
Review.Contenu: I ordered support adjustable sandals  942119 and I became very worried I had been scammed.  The delivery took much longer than expected, and had mixed messages about when it reached the US, Minneapolis and our local distribution center. I tracked the package. It was supposed to show up at my home on Aug.8.  I received a notification it was supposedly delivered at 7:15  but my security system showed no such delivery.  I received another notice that it was delivered at l0:54.  My husband was home and the Ring doorbell showed no such delivery. What is going on. now contacted support and they say SebastianIt seems 236723055840036 to be a different order number , our order number starts from  FOS.In the light of some similar emails and chats we received recently, I suspect that you along with some others could have been a victim of a mala fide online transaction..Alternatively, this can be a genuine error from the company you transacted with, you may want to try and reach out to them..Since we are not a party in this arrangement, I am afraid that we are unable to be of any assistance to you..

Review.Titre: Resolved after posting
Review.Contenu: Edited:  I am glad to report that, after posting this review, I received a phone call (and then a refund within a few days of the portion of funds that were withheld from my original return).  This amount made my refunds equal my purchase price (I paid return shipping) which was all that I asked for many months prior and wish I had posted sooner.[original post] I am so disappointed that when I returned a (brand new, in the original box, packaged impecably for return) Pet Safe dog containment system (after following the correct proceedure and receiving a RMA-Return Merchandise Authorization number) I received only a partial refund!  I have a copy of the return policy which says I can make returns for a FULL REFUND if all of these proceedures have been followed. I have made phone calls directly to the customer service, sent emails-everything short of filing a claim with my credit card company for fraud-with no satisfaction.  I was told that their policy was to not refund shipping (no shipping was charged at purchase AND I paid return shipping which wasn't cheap and further adds to my losses)!  Another comment from customer service during a phone call was that there is a 15% restocking fee (to open a box and put a perfectly good item on a shelf?). That does not sound like the written 100% refund policy listed online. They withheld $56.17 and it cost me $14.90 return shipping besides!  Unacceptable!  Every time their (daily) emails come to my inbox, the bandage is torn off again-reminding me of how this company treats its customers-I can not bear it any more and I want to warn others not to fall into the trap that I did thinking that I could believe in this company when their stated policy is that you will receive a full refund for proper returns.

I speak 5 languages so I usually do not have trouble with accents. He asked if my debit card was International. No one has been able to explain the cancellations. Review.Titre: Be sure before you buy from them, extortionate return fee.
Review.Contenu: I ordered a garmin smart watch for my wife which when I received it, wasn’t liked and was too big for her wrist.I asked to return the item which was fine with them, all good. The description they gave was accurate so no complaints there, it just didn’t suit us. So here is the gotcha and a word of warning to everyone purchasing from here. The company charge 15% of the purchase price for you to return the item and put it back on the shelf. Also I had to pay the postage back. So all in all I spent nearly £50 returning the item and have nothing to show for that £50. I cannot believe it costs so much to put a 4” square box back on a shelf. I could understand a flat rate of say £5 maybe. Shame when lots of other companies don’t charge in this way.

Review.Contenu: Bought a dog fence through FactoryOutletStore.com. The product came, just as they said it would, but when we tried to return it, even though it was never out of the original shipping box, they would not take the return.  This is not what their webpage said.  Their publish policy said we could return it for any reason up to 30 days for a small restocking fee and the cost of shipping. When we said that we wanted to return it because we had found another somewhere else for less, though, they refused to take it back saying their new policy had changed April 1, 2020 and was published online. Their webpage doesn't and never has mentioned this, though.  Saying you have new policies without publishing those policies seems like bad business.

Review.Titre: Shrinking Furnace filters...check before you buy here.
Review.Contenu: I just received my Furnace filters and was surprised to find they are apparently now being sized like "dimensional" lumber...reduced in size from what is advertised and if you don't buy the name brand you get short changed..  Supposed to be 20"x 20'x 4" but a half inch short on all dimensions.  They barely fit the hanger area and leave plenty of room for the air flow to bypass the filter on all sides.  I bought a higher MERV value to get better filtration and ended up with less coverage....Very disappointing.  Can I make them work?  Sure but at a cost of operation.  I'm so tired of fighting Corporate bottom feeders who screw the customer at every turn.  If the can shrink it, dilute it, or in some other way reduce the quality to save a fraction of a cent /unit they just don't have the integrity to do what right.

Call center is in US, no matter what they say on their website. Order number couldn't be find by them, etc. They left me frustrated and dissapointed. What a relief when finally after almost week my watch arrived,  without any notice, just nothing. Pretty happy with me watch, but overall experience is bitter-sweet, hence just 2 stars feedback. Company is legit,goods delivered in condition as described but customer service is one of the worst I've experienced in my life.

Review.Contenu: Purchased item, was told later that week via email that it was not going to process unless I called. Responded back to cancel since item would now be too late. Now they processed payment and told me item is back ordered and will process once available unless I called. Why process the order if I originally needed to call? Called got caught on hold, they tell me first that I must call my bank to cancel payment. I question it and am placed on hold. This is crazy! Luckily I used Paypal where I can dispute this. UPDATE: While on hold I all of the sudden receive an email confirming cancellation. What a mess this has been. Not sure if it's just miscommunication but I definitely wont be using this place again! Raised one star because at least they cancelled the order. Will see if I am refunded over the course of the next week.

Not cool--Does not feel like a premium experience and I perceive Celestron to be an otherwise excellent brand.  Also, I just wanted the 5 of the hard-framed eclipse glasses, but you do not offer an option that does not come bundled with the book (don't want it--certainly don't want 5 of them) and the lens filter (which I now have 5 of).  I feel like if I didnt have to get the unnecessary books and lens filters, I would not have had to pay so much.  I did anyway, however, because I believe in the quality of your products and would not entrust my children's eyes to some no-name-o cardboard eclipse glasses manufacturer.

A week later still nothing so we called and were assured that the item was shipping out that afternoon. The next day still no shipping information so we called again and were told one more time that the item was getting ready to ship but the agent would put a rush on it. Following day same scenario, no shipping information and another phone  call. This time  we were told that the previous two agents didn't know what they were doing and she was gonna send a message directly to the warehouse to have the watch shipped. A couple of days later and still nothing updated. Finally cancelled the order after this ridiculous game  of back and  forth. Still don't know what their issue was, but it was unacceptable.

Review.Titre: They aren't Amazon
Review.Contenu: Very Poor supplier.  They sent wrong material and wanted to charge a restocking fee plus return shipping.  After several emails and a phone call, they agreed to waive restocking fee but not the $34 cost to ship product back.  I'll never do business with them again and warn others to reconsider ordering product here.UDPATE 9/6/19After posting above review and additional emails and calls, customer service staff, Jessica, agreed to have return shipping reimbursed.  We have received a check for this cost.   At the end of the day, it took a lot of effort to reach a point of no product but no cost.   Their price initially looked less than Amazon, which is why I tried them.   However, their product is undersized and I would need a 20 x 25 x 5 filter to be equal to the 20 x 25 x 4 from Amazon, so Amazon ended up being cheaper and much easier to deal with.

Review.Titre: I placed an order for a supposedly "in…
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for a supposedly "in stock" item.  The order was reportedly "processed," but the promised shipping confirmation/tracking info was still outstanding after 8 days.  When I called to inquire, I was told the item was OUT of stock and back ordered.  The problem is, the item has been out of production for some time (I only placed the order with FactoryOutletStored because they claimed to have it "in stock") -- thus, the supposed back order would NOT be able to obtain the discontinued item from the manufacturer. I cancelled the order, but wished they'd let me know right away and without my having to follow-up. They also had gone ahead and charged my account, even though the item was back ordered -- highly irregular. And, for the record, the item is still shown as "in stock" on the FactoryOutletStore website.

Review.Titre: Horrible customer service and do not issue credits
Review.Contenu: Their web site defaults to the wrong part and it was shipped.  When I tried to call to return it I was told to contact the manufacture, even though they were an authorized dealer.  The return line would not be answered, then hang up.  I talked to someone twice and they hung up on me once, then was told they would refund the purchase price and I could keep the item.  That surprisingly did not happen so I had to stop payment on that charge.  I went elsewhere to get the correct part.  Horrible customer service.  Before you buy, just call the customer service with a question to see for yourself.  Do yourself a favor, save headaches and shop elsewhere.I did get credited for the part after this was posted as well as a call from Factory Outlet Store Rep asking about the one star.  I changed it to 2 stars because I had to spend a lot of my time and days waiting for a part I had to get elsewhere.  Still would not return to this store.

Review.Titre: Out of stock status
Review.Contenu: I ordered an atlas and it was supposed to be shipped in 2 to 5 business days. I was given a tracking number and after 3 days went online and checked on it, no information was available. I called and was told it was out of stock and on backorder. I was also told that an email had been sent to me stating it was on backorder on the 15th which was the same day I called. I did find the email but decided to cancel the order as the website should have shown it was out of stock before they accepted my credit card. I was told that the website would be updated to reflect the backorder status. Now 3 weeks later I checked and you still can order it with 2 to 5 days shipping. When I called again I was told it is still on backorder. I understand that FactoryOutletStore cannot control when the supplier will ship the atlas to them but they do have control over what their website shows for shipping time frame. Customers have the right to know when their credit card is charged when they should expect the product they purchased.

Review.Titre: Terrible customer service
Review.Contenu: The prices are certainly good, but hope you never have to work with their customer service.Ordered a smartwatch through them. Barely worked - battery life was way below what was advertised (draining 10x faster). Sent it back for a replacement, suddenly every excuse under the sun appeared - 'we don't operate in the UK' (it's a UK phone number), 'that's an invalid order number' (I have correspondence with them where they knew exactly what order I was talking about), and rudely hung up on me midway through without even describing what was going on. I tried to call back and they hung up on me as soon as I started speaking!After a while they finally got back to me via email, and replaced my watch with a functioning one. The customer service was so bad to the point I was convinced it was a scam - certainly didn't fill me with trust. In the end we got there, though.

Review.Titre: I purchased 13 Motorola clp1040 radios…
Review.Contenu: I purchased 13 Motorola clp1040 radios with chargers and earpieces 11 months ago. Spent just under $3,000, I just had a radio and 3 earpieces fail within the last 30 days. According to the customer service person at Factoryoutletstore.com the 2 year warranty is not thru them. I must contact Motorola to replace the failed units. Sounds fine to me. So I call Motorola and they say that they cannot replace the failed units without the order information that only Factoryoutletstore has!! I cannot use my order info and I cannot attain the numbers needed from factoryoutletstores. With that being said, the warranty is a lie. Just for giggles I called factoryoutletstore and spoke to a sales person and asked about the two year warranty and I was told that they do indeed have a two year warranty and that they would take care of me if there were to be a problem. Wow!!! Someone has a problem with integrity!!

Review.Titre: Not sure about Factory Outlet Store efficiency
Review.Contenu: I have had 2 experiences with this firm, both for high ticket items. The savings are good, but each time there has been confusion on their end requiring phone calls to clear up. The first time, they had not adequately communicated in their offer exactly which model #s were available and which were not. Ultimately, in spite of my specifying exactly what I intended to purchase, they delivered the wrong item, leaving me responsible for shipping charges to return it, and they were not able to fulfill my original request. The second time, again I was required to call them to “verify” my purchase, only to learn that the purchase had been “cancelled” due to some unidentifiable problem with my profile information. After investigation on my end, I’ve learned I cannot edit my primary PayPal address. I have moved to a new address, and the change in address short circuited something somewhere.

Review.Titre: Poor service after receiving faulty goods
Review.Contenu: I ordered a Garmin Dash Cam 65W, when the item arrived it was faulty and couldn’t even start up. I phoned the customer helpline number and was told I had to go online and fill out a returns form. After doing this I had to wait to be emailed with the returns address. I had to pay the returns myself which cost me £7:40 I emailed the company explaining that I had received faulty goods and didn’t think that it was fair that I had to pay to return the faulty item (they should in my opinion supplied me with a pre-paid returns label). They completely ignored me and I realised that the only way I was going to get the item exchanged was to pay the postage myself. I just felt that they really couldn’t care less about good customer service, and would definitely not recommend them, or use them again. Post note:- after posting this review, a representative phoned me and offered me a refund to cover the postage cost.

Review.Titre: Lowrance Hook 2 7TS
Review.Contenu: Lowrance Hook 2 7TS. We recently ordered a Hook 2 7TS with navigation and charts.  However we were never told, nor does it state on the product description, that we would need an additional mapping card at a cost of$140 or more depending on your region.  We have an older Lowrance unit that came with all the charts we needed.  Their website does not state anything about the charts.  You get Base Charts and have to order mapping charts if you want more details.  Base charts give land location.  We live on a canal and it showed us navigating our boat off land to the water.  Customer service agents were nice and polite and tried to accommodate the inconvenience, but the company itself was not very customer oriented.  Their website is misleading in respect to giving details about products or at least this product.  The product itself is nice and we will get much use out of it when we receive the mapping card. Just a word of caution for the consumer.

Review.Titre: 8 out of 12 batteries I received were defective and won't hold a charge
Review.Contenu: EDIT:  1/26/23 Am editing this review because the customer service to remedy the problem is very good.  They refunded me 50% of the original purchase, notified their warehouse to remove these batteries from stock until they could be checked, and provided a two year extended warranty for the four batteries that did work after I expressed concerned about the strength and durability of the batteries that did work.   Changed the 1 star to 3 stars to acknowledge the good customer service but still 3 stars because of the length of time it took to get the original batteries delivered, the faster but still 3-4 days to get the replacements which were duds, and the need to buy other batteries to replace the original mfg batteries which I put back in the phone as an interim measure until I could get new batteries for all the phones.  Original review:  Out of the initial 8 batteries I received, four would not charge.  These are pre-charged batteries and should have started the phones on insertion.  Four kept flashing "insert battery/charge over 7 hours".  Even when charged in the phone overnight - no power.  Called and was sent four more replacement batteries.  All four of them also would not charge.  Customer service was excellent about refunding the money but I ordered the first set Jan 9 and it took about 8 days to arrive then I had to wait another 3-4 days for the replacement batteries.  I finally ended up putting in the old original batteries that still worked.  Will not buy these batteries again.  Agent on the phone agreed that the warehouse needs to check these batteries before shipping.  66% fail rate is abysmal.

Review.Titre: Best price I found for a Minn Kota…
Review.Contenu: Best price I found for a Minn Kota trolling motor and they take PayPal, but 4 days later, I had no confirmation from them of any kind, but my bank account had been debited  . . I checked the status on line and it said there was no record of my order # . . .  . I called support and spoke to a woman in India . . it was very slow process, lots of waiting, but she was polite and helpful . . . another 4 days and still no confirmation, but there was a tracking number that showed 'In Transit" . . . so I read the on-line reviews here and another site AND BBB and now I'm thinking I really screwed up this time ( I really can't afford a $300 hit!). . but next day, there it was at my door and everything they said it would be, best price and free shipping ,  so other than lack of communication, I'm happy  . . 4.75  out of 5 stars and I will buy from them again

Review.Titre: Update - FactoryOutletStore.com turned around a bad experience
Review.Contenu: Update 12/10/23A couple of days after leaving a negative review, I received a phone call from a Factory Outlet representative who informed me that they had issued a full refund and that it was not necessary to return the filters I had purchased that were supposed to be for my air purifier but did not work in my equipment. Although the initial experience was bitter, this adjustment shows that they really care about customer service. Thank you Factory Outlet for turning around a bad experience. November 9, 2023I purchased 2 air filters advertised as a Replacement Purifier Filter For GermGuardian FLT5000 Filter C (2-Pack).  I kept them available for when the filters that came with the Germ Guardian needed to be replaced.  When I went to install the Factory Outlet filter, the size was fine, however, the original filters are in a rigid plastic frame.  The Factory Outlet filters are in a cardboard frame with foam around the outside edge.The problem is that the rigid plastic frame is necessary to depress a button in the Germ Guardian to let the device know that there is a filter installed.  The foam on the Factory Outlet filters to not depress the button, so the air purifier does not work.  The filters are totally useless.I called to return them, however, it had been six months since they were purchased because that is how long the filters that came with the Germ Guardian lasted.  Factory Outlet Store would not allow a return because it was past 30 days.  I recognize that it had been a long time, however they originally sold a product that does not work in the intended device.  It is advertised as replacement filters for the GermGuardian FLT5000.  However, they do not work in the intended device, so I consider this to be false advertising.  I am surprised that no one in their Quality Control ever actually tested the filters in the intended device.If you want to throw your money away, purchase filters from Factory Outlet Store.  If you want actual value for your dollars, buy directly from GermGuardian.
